title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 315.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 315.4 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be made available at the office of the
privacy compliance officer or at the location at which they are maintained. Whenever practicable, records shall be made available at an office near the
residence of the data subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
315.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
